employees.name: Kishan
employees.title: Software Developer
employees.bio: Kishan is fond of coding. He loves to test the application and automate stuffs to reduce regression cycle. He is fond of Selenium and Protractor. Apart from coding, he loves to listen electronic dance music. Apart from that, Kishan spends some time at stack-overflow and reads about new technologies and innovations. Know Radio is grateful to have Kishan.

employees.name: Roy
employees.title: Software Developer
employees.bio: Roy is a person who applies the principles of software engineering to the design, development, maintenance, testing, and evaluation of the software that make computers or other devices containing software work. He is a free minded guy with lots of experience in leading the team. Everyone at Know Radio wants to be part to Roy's team. Know Radio is grateful to have Roy.

employees.name: Alex
employees.title: Senior Manager
employees.bio: Alex joined the Yale faculty in 2001 after teaching at Duke Law School. Prior to starting her teaching career, she was a corporate law associate at Cleary, Gottlieb, Steen & Hamilton. Her expertise is in international business transactions, law and development, ethnic conflict, and globalization and the law. At Present,Alex manages different accounts at Know Radio.

employees.name: Jason
employees.title: Sales Manager
employees.bio: Jason is our sales Manager. He takes care of the sales accross all the province. Jason is always hardworking and we at know radio can see it year by year in the increase percentage of sales. Jason is fond of Ice Hockey and a big fan of Sarnia Sting. Jason spends his free time with nature and love writing poems on nature which are always beautiful. We are happy to have him in our team.

employees.name: Smith
employees.title: Customer Service Representative
employees.bio: Smith is Customer Service Representative for Know Radio. Smith takes care of our customers and make sure each and every customer has best expierence with Know Radio. Smith listens to customer's happiness/pain and provide them with great solution which customers never deny. Smith is fond of watching soccer. Know Radio is grateful to Smith for his splendid work.
